<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lingering Flames](/Feats.aspx?ID=3385) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 124</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)

</column>

---

When you cast _fireball_, you can modify its effects, decreasing the base damage to 5d6 and causing it to deal 2 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to creatures that fail their save, doubled as normal on a critical failure. If you do, replace its heightened entry with the following.

 **Heightened (+1)** The damage is increased by 1d6 and the persistent fire damage is increased by 2.
name: Lingering Flames
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _fireball_
